query.statement: INSERT INTO USERS ( USER_ID, CREATE_DATE, ENABLED, MODIFY_DATE, PASSWORD, USER_NAME) VALUES (:vo.userId, :vo.createDate, :vo.enabled, :vo.modifyDate, :vo.password, :vo.userName)
UPDATE USERS SET CREATE_DATE = :vo.createDate, ENABLED = :vo.enabled, MODIFY_DATE = :vo.modifyDate, PASSWORD = :vo.password, USER_NAME = :vo.userName WHERE USER_ID = :vo.userId
SELECT users.USER_ID, users.CREATE_DATE, users.ENABLED, users.MODIFY_DATE, users.PASSWORD, users.USER_NAME FROM USERS users WHERE users.USER_ID = :vo.userId
SELECT users.USER_ID, users.CREATE_DATE, users.ENABLED, users.MODIFY_DATE, users.PASSWORD, users.USER_NAME FROM USERS users order by users.USER_ID
